# Load and Graph Data

```{r Load Libraries and Data, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

gapminder <- read_csv("data/gapminder.csv")

gapminder_1992 <- gapminder %>%
  filter(year == 1992)
```

Now we make a graph

```{r Plot Data, fig.height=3, fig.width=6, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE}
ggplot(data = gapminder_1992,
       mapping = aes(x=gdpPercap, y= lifeExp, color = continent)) +
    geom_point()
  
```
